channel.title: Birds on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Birds on ZooBerry

item.title: Rhea
item.description: A large, flightless bird of South America with new skin, sound, and enrichment.

item.title: White-Flippered Penguin
item.description: One of the smallest penguin species alive today, with two variant skins.

item.title: African Crowned Crane
item.description: A crane with recolored skins and a nest, inspired by the Secretary Bird.

item.title: King Penguin
item.description: A large penguin species with fixed alphabetical issues and fame stars in the mod.

item.title: Jungle Escape
item.description: Add an UXP containing several birds from different tropical regions. Objects fit perfectly with the default jungle theme.

item.title: Island Excursions
item.description: Embark upon an excursion to travel the oceans in search of tropical paradise! Discover the isles hiding within the Hawaiian Islands and Papua New Guinea, seeing such animals as the Hawaiian Monk Seal and the Northern Cassowary as they live in their lush and vibrant homes.

item.title: Macaw Pack P2
item.description: A pack of macaws, including the Martinique Macaw, Lesser Antillean Macaw, Red Jamaican Macaw, Indigo Macaw, Great Green Macaw, Golden Collared Macaw, Fronted-Chestnut Macaw, and On√©couli Macaw.

item.title: Macaw Pack P1
item.description: A pack of macaws, including the Red-Fronted Macaw, Military Macaw, Hyacinth Macaw, Cuban Macaw, Blue-Winged Macaw, Blue-Throated Macaw, Blue-Headed Macaw, and Blue and Gold Macaw.

item.title: Lovely Lovebirds 1
item.description: A pair of lovebirds, the Yellow-collared Lovebird and the Black-winged Lovebird.

item.title: Dwarf Cassowary
item.description: Casuarius bennetti is found on the island of New Guinea. The majority of the population resides in Papua New Guinea, on the eastern side of the island.

item.title: Cassowary
item.description: Cassowaries are very large flightless birds native to the tropical forests of New Guinea and northeastern Australia.

item.title: Megafauna Pack
item.description: A megafauna pack made by Zooasaurus.

item.title: Brown Pelican
item.description: A large, colourful Pelican found in South and Central America. Has 2 varients, biome is Reef.
